com.datamelt.rules.implementation

Class CheckIsEqual

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datamelt.rules.implementation.GenericCheck
      • com.datamelt.rules.implementation.CheckIsEqual
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @CheckAnnotation(name="Check is equal",
                 description="Check for equality of values",
                 nameDescriptive="is equal to",
                 checkSingleField=0)
public class CheckIsEqual
extends GenericCheck
    Checks if a given string is equal to another string, if two numbers are equal or if two dates are equal.

    The default format for comparing dates is yyyy-MM-dd.

    The first parameter of a given method is always the value of the field that shall be checked. The second parameter is either another field to check against or an expected value (fixed value) to check against the first value.

    Author:
    uwe geercken
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • evaluate

        @CheckMethodAnnotation(note="The integer value is converted to a boolean value")
public static boolean evaluate(boolean value1,
                                                                                                                int value2)
        Evaluates if a boolean value and an integer value - converted to a boolean value - are equal. An integer of value 1 is converted to a boolean true, an integer of value 0 is converted to a boolean false. In all other cases false is returned.
        Parameters:
        value1 - first value for comparison
        value2 - second value for comparison
        Returns:
        indication if the two values are equal

public static boolean evaluate(java.lang.String value1,

                                                                                                                              java.lang.String format)
        Evaluates if two dates provided as string values are equal using the specified date format.
        Parameters:
        value1 - first value for comparison
        value2 - second value for comparison
        format - the format of both dates according to the SimpleDateFormat class
        Returns:
        indication if the two values are equal
